Reviews.Title: “Nicest Comfort Suites I've stayed in in Memphis”
Reviews.Author: businesstrav1
Reviews.Content: I travel to Memphis frequently and like to earn points by staying at Comfort Suites, so I've tried a number of them here. This one was very nice, newer, and the location is very close to a lot of restaurants and shopping, while still being convenient to the highway. I was impressed to find out they have an airport shuttle as it is a ways from the airport. Couldn't quite give it an excellent as the lighting in the bathroom is really inadequate for applying makeup. Pretty sconces but more form than function, and a bit of mold along the bathtub. But I'll definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel it self was nice, but the staff was horrible.”
Reviews.Author: Deedy D
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel during the summer and the hotel is really nice, but the staff was horrible. When my family and I arrived our first room was dirty, and the second one we were given had other people items still in the room. The staff was horrible both night and morning staff. I will never ever stay at this hotel again. The way they talked to the black people in there was just down right wrong, I am not black and I felt really bad for the way they talked to them. I will never ever stay there again and I will tell all of my friends to avoid this hotel whenever they are in Memphis. To Mr Cerrato and Ms Higgingbotham please find a new line of work!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Pick”
Reviews.Author: handatravellers
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed our stay at the hotel. With this being our first trip to Memphis we were unsure about where to stay however this turned out to be a great pick. The surrounding area was quite and near shopping....Our room was elegant and clean, hot breakfast every morning, and the workers at the front desk were helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel nicely decorated, but the management staff was terrible, especially the general manager "Cerrato"”
Reviews.Author: mercyandgrace
Reviews.Content: The treatment we encountered at this hotel was unacceptable. Upon our arrival, we were given dirty rooms and rooms that were occupied by other guests. After several rooming assignments we finally received a room ready for check in. My room keys were deactivated twice within the 1st day. On the 2nd day, we had to check out at the request of "Cerrato" who phoned the cops on our group without cause. He is a very disrespectful person and should not be working with anyone in the public. It has been brought to my attention that this type of treatment happens almost always to african americans. I am pleading with the ownership to take a look into the unnecessary treatment at the hands of your employees (Cerrato & Higginbotham) or your business will be facing voluminous legal actions. Cerrato & Higginbotham don't have a clue as to who they were talking with or even what they've done... just know that what you've done to us has already been done to you. I pray for you both because "NO WEAPONS FORMED AGAINST US SHALL PROSPER".

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel, Rude Staff”
Reviews.Author: marcia2465
Reviews.Content: Hotel is fairly new and is nice, however, the staff needs some training. One staff member knocked and then unlocked our door twice in one evening. She said she didn't think anyone was in the room although it was our second night there. There was confusion at check in and they gave us a key to an occupied room. The breakfast was not as good as most and they offered a weekday "dinner", which didn't look very good but some people were eating it and seemed to enjoy it. I think I will skip it next trip.

Reviews.Title: “Great rooms, that's about it”
Reviews.Author: Troy_Boy_C
Reviews.Content: I like the rooms a lot, spacious enough and clean. The only complaint was that the "Heated Pool" was freezing and the Hot tub or "Whirlpool" was not hot at all and smelled. It was also really small, maybe three people could fit in it, if they wanted to.

Reviews.Title: “THE place to stay in Germantown area”
Reviews.Author: yekcim75
Reviews.Content: First of all, the property itself is beautiful. It was in great condition inside and out. I checked in with the Night Auditor who has master the balance between friendly and professional. When I came down a couple of hours later to get a drink from the Sundry Shop, he even remembered who I was and what room I was in. I canâ€™t say enough about the room itself. Both beautiful and unique in its design, thanks to housekeeping it was also spotless. (And I am a tough inspector.) There was only one issue I saw while I was there: it is very difficult to get the shower curtain pulled close enough to the edge of the shower to prevent water from running out onto the bathroom floor. The breakfast in the morning was good and kept fresh. A girlsâ€™ soccer team had just left the area, so the breakfast person was very busy trying to restock everything. She still managed to work in a smile and a â€œGood Morningâ€� when she passed me. Checkout was a breeze and Tekela, the desk clerk, was very nice. All in all, my stay at the Comfort Suites Southwind well exceeded my expectations. I would gladly recommend this hotel to anyone going to the Memphis/Germantown area.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel experience”
Reviews.Author: cujomax
Reviews.Content: This was a great hotel to stay in. When we checked in, the front desk clerk was so friendly and helpful. The rooms exceeded our expectations. The pool facility was very clean and well taken care off. The breakfast was pretty good, with a variety of items. The only snag on our trip was on our final day, housekeeping did not come to our room. The desk clerk was very apologetic and took 10% off our room for that night.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful front desk staff with personalities to match”
Reviews.Author: ChadWilliams
Reviews.Content: I can't say how great the front desk workers. Not only were they beautiful but their personalities were great. They gave us great selections on restaurants, things to do, and when we got lost, the manager met us on the hiway to lead us to the hotel. How about that for going the extra mile (no pun intended). Ron was great we came in late he was very cheerful and brought us extra towels and blanket to our room. I can't wait to come back to Memphis. I will be staying back with folks at comfort suites. I will recommend it to all my friends.

HotelInfo.Name: Comfort Suites Southwind
HotelInfo.Address: 4090 Stansell Court, Next Door to 4068 Stansell, Memphis, TN 38125
